devdoc.author: Daniel Dimitrov - @compojoom, Fred Lührs - @fredo

addVesting(uint8,bool,uint16,uint64,uint.details: This can only be called by the pool managerIt is required that the pool has enough tokens available

params.amount: Amount of tokens that should be vested in atoms
params.curveType: Type of the curve that should be used for the vesting
params.durationWeeks: The duration of the vesting in weeks
params.initialUnlock: Amount of tokens that should be unlocked immediately
params.managed: Boolean that indicates if the vesting can be managed by the pool manager
params.startDate: The date when the vesting should be started (can be in the past)

returns._0: vestingId The id of the created vesting

calculateVestedAmount(bytes32).details: This will revert if the vesting has not been started yet

params.vestingId: Id of the vesting for which to calculate the amounts

returns.claimedAmount: The amount in atoms of tokens claimed
returns.vestedAmount: The amount in atoms of tokens vested

cancelVesting(bytes32).details: This can only be called by the pool managerOnly manageable vestings can be cancelled

params.vestingId: Id of the vesting that should be cancelled

claimVestedTokens(bytes32,address,uint12.details: This can only be called by the owner of the vestingBeneficiary cannot be the 0-addressThis will trigger a transfer of tokens

params.beneficiary: Account that should receive the claimed tokens
params.tokensToClaim: Amount of tokens to claim in atoms or max uint128 to claim all available
params.vestingId: Id of the vesting from which the tokens should be claimed

initialize(address,address,address).details: This can only be called once

params._owner: The owner of this vesting pool (e.g. the address that can call `delegateTokens`)
params._poolManager: The manager of this vesting pool (e.g. the address that can call `addVesting`)
params._token: The token that should be used for the vesting

pauseVesting(bytes32).details: This can only be called by the pool managerOnly manageable vestings can be paused

params.vestingId: Id of the vesting that should be paused

tokensAvailableForVesting().details: This value changes when more tokens are deposited to this contract

returns._0: Amount of tokens that can be used for new vestings.

unpauseVesting(bytes32).details: This can only be called by the pool managerOnly vestings that have not been cancelled can be unpaused

params.vestingId: Id of the vesting that should be unpaused

devdoc.title: Vesting contract for single account Original contract - https://github.com/safe-global/safe-token/blob/main/contracts/VestingPool.sol

addVesting(uint8,bool,uint16,uint64,uint.notice: Create a vesting on this pool for `account`.

calculateVestedAmount(bytes32).notice: Calculate vested and claimed token amounts for vesting `vestingId`.

claimVestedTokens(bytes32,address,uint12.notice: Claim `tokensToClaim` tokens from vesting `vestingId` and transfer them to the `beneficiary`.

tokensAvailableForVesting().notice: Calculate the amount of tokens available for new vestings.
